thread.title: Live blog: Bills visit Titans in Week 5
thread.title_full: Live blog: Bills visit Titans in Week 5

author: Staff report
title: Live blog: Bills visit Titans in Week 5
text:
The Bills' 2-2 record isn't terrible. It isn't great, either. And we'll wager a guess and say the Pegulas didn't spend all that money just to go 8-8 this year.
Buffalo will try to bounce back from last week's disappointing loss to the Giants when it visits the rookie quarterback Marcus Mariota and the Titans on Sunday (1 p.m., CBS). The Bills haven't beaten the Titans since 2000 â€” going 0-for-5 since (with three of those losses by 2 points or less). Armed with high expectations, but a depleted backfield , Rex Ryan and company look to put an end to that streak this afternoon.
ROCHESTER DEMOCRAT AND CHRONICLE
Bills get passing grades for first four games
Follow along as reporter Sal Maiorana tweets updates throughout the game from Nissan Stadium. Check back later for complete coverage.
